title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description: Any item cannot be selected at the first attempt in the library outline view.
OB: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the selection is not registered.
EB: The item should be selectable on the first attempt in the library outline view.
SR:
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
3. Verify that the item can be selected correctly.
